item.author: Mαrψ
item.value:
Task can save the roles by using abbreviations of each role. For example you can use * /ts ma * instead of using * /ts mason *.
*List of Abbreviations for Each Role Used in Task*
ch = cultist hunter💂‍♀️ bh = beholder 👁 ga = gaurdian angel👼 se = seer 👳 ha = harlot 💋 de = detective🕵‍♂ app = apprentice seer 🙇 or = oracle 🌀 fo = fool🃏 gu = gunner 🔫 au = augur 🦅 cm = chemist🧑‍🔬 sm = sandsman 💤 bs = blacksmith ⚒ hu = hunter 🎯 pc = pacifist ☮️ tm = troublemaker 🤯 gd = grave digger ☠️ we = wise elder 📚 mj = mayor🎖 pr = prince 👑 cp = cupid 🏹 dr = drunk 🍻 cg = clumsy guy 🤕 wm = wolfman 👨🌚 ma = mason👷 vg = lowly villager👱 wc = wild child 👶 cr = cursed 😾 tr = traitor🖕 cult = cult 👤 aw = alpha wolf⚡️ cub = wolf cub 🐶 x = lycan 🐺🌝 ww = werewolf🐺 sw = Snow Wolf🐺⛄️ sc = sorcerer 🔮 sk = serial killer 🔪 ta = tanner 👺 arr = arsonist 🔥 dg = doppelganger 🎭 th = thief 😈
